column5: 2025 will be the last year for production.  https://www.yamaha-motor.ca/en/snowmobile-faq?fbclid=IwAR1X1dzN8um2JNcauv5mMAKE6STGXJqpsact6WRwX5NJekxm9CreSFaLNVU
We knew it was coming, first they quit selling in Russia then it was Europe , so I figured we were next
I really liked the engines in the ones I had.
With the climate changing as it is, snow machines are not going to be a viable business soon.
Yes the writing is on the wall, less and less snow on the trails over the last years, better to get an ATV and get a set of tracks.
The only reason I sold mine, you can't go trail riding with it. I've got a modest 5100km on my ATV.
Wonder if it's time to give up my 05 Bravo?
Noooo, as long as you can find parts, I'd keep it.
